docs.text: Introduction Hello, I am Karimi Zayan I am currently an NSF Firefighter Trainee at SCDF. I was formerly from NUS High School and graduated in 2023 with an honours in Mathematics and Computer Science and Major in Physics and Chemistry. After NS, I will be reading Mathematics and Computer Science at NUS College. I enjoy running, reading, watching movies and playing video games in my free time. This website contains some info about me and my Blog page which is fun academic stuff I have done on the side as an excercise. Books The books page covers the books I have read and what I have thought about them Research Eventually, I plan to present my research work here Blog Sometimes I get interested by things and these are some excercises I did Contact Contact information... Pretty self-explanatory
